EmailTemplate.description: This is used to send the email template content to Laphroaig Distillery
EmailTemplate.name: Send Email To Tour Booking Template_html
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} has been assigned to Laphroaig Distillery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
You have a new case #{!Case.CaseNumber} in the queue.
Thanks
{!Case.Thread_Id}
